search.query: index=$index$ host=$host$ sourcetype=$sourcetype$ | spath application message level environment method thread_name | search application="rds-master-file-adapter" (status=error OR "error") | eval msg=coalesce(message,_raw) | sort 0 - _time | dedup msg application level /* remove dup lines that are the same */ | table _time level application msg | head 10
